snippet.title: Mendacium Demo - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Enter the prehistoric metroidvania themed around primal reptiles. Evolve by slaying savage enemies and bosses with the combination of melee & ranged combat, primitive traps, and elemental magic. Explore the vast handpainted world and uncover its history.

Mendacium on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2521660/Mendacium/

Check out Ascendum on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1504090/Ascendum/

Team Caecus Discord:
https://discord.gg/GtZar6DZr4

Play Ruins of Albion on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1719100/Ruins_of_Albion/

Caecus Twitter: https://twitter.com/TCaecus

Follow the composer Lukian:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lukianze/
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/user-864799849-361065325
